itunes:title: John Wood Jr. of Better Angels | Bret Weinstein's DarkHorse Podcast #4
title: John Wood Jr. of Better Angels | Bret Weinstein's DarkHorse Podcast #4
description:
John Wood Jr. - Media Director and National Leader at Better Angels discusses the effects of political polarization in our cultural discourse and offers solutions to overcome this hazard by tapping into our better angels. 

Follow John Wood Jr. on Twitter: https://twitter.com/JohnRWoodJr 
https://www.better-angels.org/ 

Find and Help Support this work below: 
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/bretweinstein/ 

Twitter: 
@BretWeinstein 
https://twitter.com/BretWeinstein 

Support is also welcome via Paypal: https://paypal.me/bretweinstein 

Support the show
